idlastro/

tab_expand.pro


top source tab_expand

tab_expand, tcb, tab, maxcol, maxrow, rowlen

NAME: TAB_EXPAND PURPOSE: routine to expand the size of an SDAS table file.

CALLING SEQUENCE: tab_expand, tcb, tab, maxcol, maxrow, rowlen

INPUT/OUTPUT: tcb - table control block returned by routine TAB_READ or TAB_CREATE. tab - table array

OPTIONAL INPUTS: maxcol - new maximum number of columns. maxrow - new maximum number of rows. rowlen - new maximum row length in 2 byte units.

If maxcol, maxrow, or rowlen are supplied with values less than the previous maximums, the previous maximums are used. All values are defaulted to zero if not supplied.

HISTORY: Version 1 D. Lindler Dec. 88 Converted to IDL V5.0 W. Landsman September 1997

Parameters

tcb
tab
maxcol
maxrow
rowlen
